Package marvel.model

Interface ModelFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelImpl
    public interface ModelFacade
    Provides methods for clients to make mutable and accessor calls to APIs. Acts as an interface for the client to interact with the complex model subsystem.
    See Also:
    InputModel, OutputModel, ModelImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addObserver​(ModelObserver obs)
      Adds observer to list of ModelObserver, to be notified upon API requests completed
      void getCharacterInfo​(java.lang.String name)
      Conduct search for character information using String name provided
      CharacterInfo getCurrentCharacter()
      Getter for input model's current CharacterInfo that it retrieved from last successful search

      Retrieve full URL path to thumbnail image given a CharacterInfo object
